I need you to verify the AI Sports Edge project folder structure. This is part of a larger workspace validation task.

## Context
- The project should be located at: `/Users/lisadario/Desktop/ai-sports-edge`
- This is a React Native (Expo) app using atomic architecture with Firebase and Stripe integration

## Your Task
1. Confirm the following required directories exist:
   - /docs/
   - /public/
   - /src/
